root: ^Beau: It never lasts more than a week.
^Rhodes: Oh, should we go somewhere else?

DontGo: ^Beau: Sure, but I doubt you’ll find much in this neck of the woods.
^Beau: Quite a few miles to the next town.
^Beau: Can’t even get a repair man in to fix it.
^Rhodes: I guess I can give it a try.
^Rhodes: Let me give it a try!
^Rhodes: Welp, that’s what ya get for relying on the system. I used to work construction, I could give it a go.
^Rhodes: Well, I’m no mechanic, but standing here complaining won’t fix it.
FixIt: ^Beau: Yea, I don’t know what good it’ll do, but go for it.
